name: Escape From the Wastes
description: An experimental Harlowe Twine game that I created for an ongoing project known as the Red City, Escape From the Wastes uses a text-adventure format where the player selects options provided to explore, progress the story, and arrive at one of the seven endings present. The game has a large focus on exploration and uncovering clues to unlock new routes, with the seventh secret ending even requiring clues from five endings before it. It also features digital artwork made by me for all the major characters.
